body: You are not easily fooled by illusions and forgeries.
name: Discerning Eye
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Half-Elves/New Racial Rules/Half-Elven Feats/Discerning Eye

sections.body: Elf or half-elf, keen senses racial trait.
sections.name: Prerequisites

sections.body: You receive a +2 racial bonus on saving throws against illusion spells and effects and a +2 bonus on Linguistic checks to detect forgeries. You can use the Linguistic skill to detect forgeries untrained.
sections.name: Benefit
